pages.text: The $(item)Transfer Gadget/$ is a rather basic item/fluid transfer item. It can be placed $(italic)between/$ two inventories or tanks to transfer between them. The best way to place it is to first place down one inventory, then right click the side of that block with a $(item)Transfer Gadget/$, then place the second inventory.

The Transfer Gadget will show two colors:$(li)$(9)Blue/$, indicating the input side.$(li)$(6)Orange/$, indicating the output side.$(p)The $(item)Transfer Gadget/$ transfers items from the $(9)blue input side/$ to the $(6)orange output side/$, at a rate of 1 item or 100mB fluid every 2 seconds.

$(thing)Right-click/$ the $(item)Transfer Gadget/$ with a $(l:tools/logistics_configurator)Logistics Configurator/$, to toggle the input and output sides. $(thing)Sneak+right-click/$ to remove the $(item)Transfer Gadget/$.$(p)Because of its slow speed and cheap recipe, this is ideal for early-game item/fluid transfer where space is limited.
